title: Voice-activated 'Hey Cortana' arrives on Android with stipulations
text:
Voice-activated 'Hey Cortana' arrives on Android with stipulations 
Published By: AndroidCentral.com - Today 
Microsoft is continuing to expand Cortana their future information hub for all things Microsoft with an update to the beta Android app. Vers...
